Draw text
On this page
Draw text
This will draw text on the game screen with the given parameters.
tip
You can find all field commands for PSC at
https://psc.dev/
. Field commands are useful functions that can be used in nearly all text fields in PSC.
Parameters
â€‹
Text (text)
X (number)
Y (number)
Font (font)
Font Size (number)
Color (color)
Draw outline (true or false)
Outline color (color)
